project_context: WebSurfer-β: Vision-enhanced autonomous web-surfing agent with Mac Studio LLM (llama4:scout vision model) and Chrome Browser MCP. Complete ADK workflow with visual webpage analysis, screenshot processing, and intelligent navigation. Production-ready system.

next_steps: Optimize vision model performance for web browsing
Add memory persistence with screenshot storage

decisions: llama4:scout set as default for vision capabilities
Visual analysis workflow: screenshot → analyze → act
Implemented graceful fallback for missing Chrome extension
Use Mac Studio endpoint instead of multiple LLM providers
Use Browser MCP instead of Selenium/Playwright

adr.title: Use Mac Studio Local LLM Endpoint
adr.decision: Integrate with Ollama via https://matiass-mac-studio.tail174e9b.ts.net/v1 instead of cloud LLM providers

adr.title: Use Browser MCP for Automation
adr.decision: Use Browser MCP with Chrome extension instead of Selenium/Playwright for web automation
